metadata.title: Lenovo ThinkPad T480s Windows 10 Pro Laptop - Intel Core i7-8650U, 24GB RAM, 1TB SSD, 14" IPS FHD Touch (1920x1080) Display, Fingerprint Reader
features: Intel Core i7-8650U (8M Cache, up to 4.2GHz) - 1TB Solid State Drive - 24GB PC4-17000 DDR4L SDRAM, 2400MHz SODIMM
14" IPS Full HD (1920x1080) Anti-Glare (Matte) Touchscreen Display - Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 620 - Stereo Speakers
Fingerprint Reader - Built in HD 720p Webcam with Dual noise-cancelling Microphones - Intel Dual Band Wireless 8265 AC with Bluetooth 4.1

Connectivity: 4-in-1 SD card reader (MMC, SD, SDHC, SDXC), 2x USB 3.1 ports (One Always On), 1x USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 1 for data/charging/display, 1x USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 2/Intel Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo Jack, HDMI 1.4b, RJ-45 Gigabit LAN Port, Docking connection
Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit - ThinkPad Precision Backlit Keyboard/ 57Wh Battery - Black Color
description: With the new 8th generation Intel Core i7 processor, the ThinkPad T480s can take you to new heights of productivity. The ThinkPad T480s gives you the power of a desktop PC--with the freedom of a portable laptop.
Tested for battle, Built for Success—Anywhere
Every ThinkPad laptop undergoes 21 MIL-SPEC tests for reliability and durability, including the ability to survive in hazardous physical and environmental conditions.

The ThinkPad T480s has an optional match-on-chip fingerprint reader, anti-spoofing technology that authenticates log-in credentials and helps safeguards your data, and ThinkShutter, a webcam cover that you can open and close.

The ThinkPad T480s includes Intel Thunderbolt 3—the technology that brings lightning-fast Thunderbolt to USB-C at speeds up to 40 Gbps. Connect a cable from your USB-C port to a Thunderbolt 3-enabled device, and get four times the data and twice the video bandwidth of any other port type, while also supplying power.

- Intel Core i7-8650U Processor (8M Cache, up to 4.20 GHz) - Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, Intel UHD 620 Integrated Graphics - 14" IPS Full HD Touchscreen 1920x1080 resolution, matte anti-glare screen - 1TB SATA M.2 Solid State Drive - 24GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz - Intel Centrino 8265 AC 2x2 Premium Dual Band WiFi - Bluetooth 4.1, Integrated 720p HD webcam - Stereo speakers, Dual-array microphones - 6-row backlit keyboard - Fingerprint Reader - Trusted Platform Module (TPM) - I/O Ports: 4-in-1 reader, 2x USB 3.1 ports (One Always On), 1x USB3.1 Type-C Gen 1 for data/charging/display, 1x USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 2/Intel Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo Jack, HDMI 1.4b, RJ-45 Gigabit LAN Port, Docking connection

title: Perfect for a Simple Business Laptop
